name: END
description: Ends the current event

name: LIfe +
description: Recover W health

name: Max Life +
description: Increase the current and maximum health by W

name: Arms Energy +
description: Refill all weapon ammo

name: ITem +
description: Give item W

name: ITem -
description: Remove item W

name: EQuip +
description: Equip item(s) W

name: EQuip -
description: Dequip item(s) W

name: ArMs +
description: Give weapon W with X ammo. Use 0000 for infinite ammo

name: ArMs -
description: Remove weapon W

name: Zero ArMs
description: Sets all weapon energy to zero

name: Trade ArMs
description: Trade weapon W for weapon X and set max ammo to Y. Use 0000 to keep the same amount of ammo

name: Portal Slot +
description: Set teleporter slot W to event X. Selecting slot W while using the teleporter menu will jump to event X

name: MaP +
description: Set map flag W. Map flags cannot be unset. Highest usable flag is 127.

name: UNIt
description: Set character movement type. Use 0000 for normal; 0001 for zero-G and 0002 to disallow movement.

name: Save Time Counter
description: Saves current time to 290.rec

name: TRAnsport
description: Travel to map W; run event X; and move the PC to coordinates Y:Z

name: MOVe
description: Move the PC to coordinates W:X

name: Hide My Character
description: Hide the PC

name: Show My Character
description: Show the PC

name: FLag +
description: Set flag W. Valid flags range from 0-7999

name: FLag -
description: Unset flag W

name: SKipflag +
description: Set skipflag W

name: Skipflag -
description: Unset skipflag W

name: KEY lock
description: Lock player controls and hide status bars until <END.

name: PRevent Interaction
description: Lock player controls and freeze game action

name: FREe
description: Free game action and the PC

name: NOD
description: Wait for player input before resuming script

name: CLeaR
description: Clear message box.

name: MeSsaGe
description: Open a message box at the bottom of the screen

name: MeSsage 2
description: Open an invisible message box at the top of screen

name: MeSsage 3
description: Open a message box at the top of screen

name: WAIt
description: Pause script for W ticks

name: WAit until Standing
description: Pause script until character is on ground

name: Text UnRead?
description: Instantly display text. Use after a <MSG/2/3; works until another <MSG/2/3 or an <END

name: Speed-up All Text
description: Instantly display text. Use before a <MSG/2/3; works until <END. Same command as <CAT

name: (C?) All Text
description: Instantly display text. Use before a <MSG/2/3; works until <END. Same command as <SAT

name: CLOse
description: Close message box

name: EVEnt
description: Go to event W

name: Yes/No Jump
description: Prompt Yes/No; jump to event W if No is selected

name: FLag Jump
description: Jump to event X if flag W is set

name: SKipflag Jump
description: Jump to event X if skipflag W is set

name: ITem Jump
description: Jump to event X if the PC has item W

name: ArMs Jump
description: Jump to event X if the PC has weapon W

name: UNit Jump
description: Jump to event X if movement is of type W (0000 for normal; 0001 for zero-G)

name: Event Check Jump
description: Jump to event X if any entities W exist

name: Npc Check Jump
description: Jump to event X if any entity of type W exists

name: MaP Jump
description: Jump to event W if the map flag for the current area is set

name: Start Stream Sound
description: Start the stream sound with volume W

name: Clear Stream Sound
description: Stops the stream sound.

name: Start Propeller Sound
description: Start the propeller sound

name: Clear Prop. Sound
description: Stops the propeller sound

name: QUAke
description: Shake the screen for W ticks

name: FLAsh
description: Flash the screen white

name: FAde In
description: Fade in with direction W

name: FAde Out
description: Fade out with direction W

name: Map NAme
description: Display the map name

name: Focus On Me
description: Focus on the PC in W ticks. Use W > 0

name: Focus On Npc
description: Focus on entity W in X ticks. Use X > 0

name: Focus On Boss
description: Focus on boss W in X ticks. Use X > 0

name: SOUnd
description: Play sound effect W

name: Change MUsic
description: Change music to song W

name: Fade MUsic
description: Fade the music out

name: Restore MUsic
description: Resume the song last played

name: Map LooP
description: Shows the map system view of/enters the map loop for the current area

name: Show Location Portals
description: Show the teleporter menu

name: Delete NPc
description: Remove all entities W

name: Delete Npc (All)
description: Remove all entities of type W

name: BOss Animation
description: Give map-boss scriptstate W

name: Change NPc
description: Change all entities W to type X with direction Y

name: Animate NPc
description: Give all entities W scriptstate X and direction Y

name: (Initialize?) NPc
description: Change entity W to type X with direction Y and set entity flag 100 (0x8000)

name: Set NPc
description: Create an entity of type W at coordinates X:Y with direction Z

name: Move NPc
description: Move entity W to coordinates X:Y with direction Z

name: Shift Map Parts
description: Subtract 1 from the tile type at coordinates W:X. Does not create smoke

name: Change Map Parts
description: Change the tile at coordinates W:X to type Y. Produces smoke

name: Boss Script Load
description: Start boss fight with entity W. Use 0000 to end the boss fight

name: MY Direction
description: Causes the PC to face direction W

name: MY Bump
description: Causes the PC to hop in the direction opposite of W. Using up or down causes the jump to be vertical

name: My Motion 0
description: Halt the PC's forward motion

name: INItialize
description: Reset memory and restart game

name: SaVe Profile
description: Saves current game

name: LoaD Profile
description: Load the saved game

name: FACe
description: Show face W in the message box

name: Graphic ITem
description: Display an item or weapon icon above the message box. Add 1000 to W for items. Use 0000 to remove

name: NUMber
description: Prints the value [4a5b34+W*4] to the message box. Use 0000 to print the last used W from compatible commands (eg AM+)

name: CREdits
description: Rolls credits

name: Show ILlustration
description: Show illustration W (during credits)

name: Clear ILlustration
description: Clear illustration (during credits)

name: XX1
description: Show the island falling in manner W. Use 0000 to have it crash and 0001 to have it stop midway

name: ESCape
description: Quit to title screen
